com.qtplaf.library.database

Interface Persistor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataPersistor, DBPersistor

    public interface Persistor
    Interface that should implement back end persistence engines that operate with records of views.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count(Criteria criteria)
      Count the number of records that agree with the criteria.
      int delete(Criteria criteria)
      Deletes records based on a selection criteria.
      int delete(Record record)
      Delete a record.
      boolean exists(OrderKey primaryKey)
      Check if the primary key exists within its persistent layer.
      boolean exists(Record record)
      Check if the record exists within its persistent layer.
      boolean exists(Value... primaryKey)
      Check if the primary key exists within its persistent layer.
      PersistorDDL getDDL()
      Returns a suitable DDL.
      Record getDefaultRecord()
      Returns the default record of the underlying view.
      Field getField(int index)
      Returns a field by index.
      Field getField(java.lang.String alias)
      Returns a field by alias.
      int getFieldCount()
      Returns the number of fields this persistor manages.

      Returns the index of the field with the given alias or -1.

      Returns the record given the list of primnary key values.

      Returns the record given the primary key.

      Returns the underlying view of the persistor.

      Insert a record.

      Returns a record iterator to scan the records that agree with the criteria.
      RecordIterator iterator(Criteria criteria, Order order)
      Returns a record iterator to scan the records that agree with the criteria, in the given order.
      ValueMap max(Criteria criteria, int... indexes)
      Returns the maximum values of the argument field list with the filter criteria.

      Returns the maximum values of the argument field with the filter criteria.

      Returns the minimum values of the argument field with the filter criteria.

      Returns true if the record has successfully refreshed.

      Select a list of records based on a selection criteria.

      Select a list of records based on a selection criteria, returning the list with the given order.

      Returns the list of values that are the sum of the numeric argument fields applying the filter criteria.

      Returns the list of values that are the sum of the numeric argument fields applying the filter criteria.

      Update a set of fields with given values for the firlter criteria.

      Update a record.

        long count(Criteria criteria)
    throws PersistorException
        Count the number of records that agree with the criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The filter criteria.
        Returns:
        The number of records that agree with the criteria.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • delete

        int delete(Criteria criteria)
    throws PersistorException
        Deletes records based on a selection criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The criteria to select the entities to delete.
        Returns:
        The number of deleted records.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • delete

        int delete(Record record)
    throws PersistorException
        Delete a record.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to delete.
        Returns:
        The number deleted records (one or zero).
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • exists

        boolean exists(Record record)
        throws PersistorException
        Check if the record exists within its persistent layer.
        Parameters:
        record - The record.
        Returns:
        A boolean stating if the record exists within its persistent layer.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • refresh

        boolean refresh(Record record)
         throws PersistorException
        Returns true if the record has successfully refreshed.
        Parameters:
        record - The source record that must have set at least the primary key
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the record has successfully refreshed.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

        Parameters:
        record - The record to insert.

        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • save

        int save(Record record)
  throws PersistorException
        Saves the record, inserting if it does not exists and updating if it does.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to save.
        Returns:
        The number of updated records (one or zero).
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

          throws PersistorException
        Select a list of records based on a selection criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The selection criteria.
        Returns:
        The list of records.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • select

        RecordSet select(Criteria criteria,
                 Order order)
          throws PersistorException
        Select a list of records based on a selection criteria, returning the list with the given order.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The selection criteria.
        order - The selection order.
        Returns:
        The list of records.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • sum

        ValueMap sum(Criteria criteria,
             int... indexes)
      throws PersistorException
        Returns the list of values that are the sum of the numeric argument fields applying the filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The filter criteria.
        indexes - The list of indexes.
        Returns:
        The list of values in a value map keyed by index.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • sum

        ValueMap sum(Criteria criteria,
             java.lang.String... aliases)
      throws PersistorException
        Returns the list of values that are the sum of the numeric argument fields applying the filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The filter criteria.
        aliases - The list of field aliases.
        Returns:
        The list of values in a value map keyed by alias.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • update

        int update(Record record)
    throws PersistorException
        Update a record.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to update.
        Returns:
        The number of updated records (one or zero).
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.

      • update

        int update(Criteria criteria,
           ValueMap map)
    throws PersistorException
        Update a set of fields with given values for the firlter criteria. The map of values can be keyed either by index, alias or field.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The filter criteria.
        map - The map of field-values.
        Returns:
        The number of updated records.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If a persistor error occurs.
